snippet: Serena Williams will miss the season-ending WTA Finals for the second year in a row, citing a right shoulder injury....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams will miss the season-ending WTA Finals for the second year in a row, citing a right shoulder injury.

headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Out of WTA Finals, Citing Injured Shoulder
headline.main: Serena Williams Out of WTA Finals, Citing Injured Shoulder
